Everything You Need to Win

Powerful features designed for serious fantasy managers

Customize weights for every rating. College vs HS, power vs contact - your strategy, your rankings.

Archetype Labels

Instantly identify player types: Ace Potential, Power Bat, Defensive SS, and more.
